name: Pacify the Chicken
description:
Erica and her friends are camping in the woods when suddenly...she's left all alone ... aside from the man-eating chicken! Will she escape? You'll have to collect the five bags of grain to Pacify the Chicken and escape the forest alive!

This is a prototype to figure out mechanics etc.

Please let me know if you encounter any bugs!

Controls:

Enter is the action button

Arrow keys to move

C to dash
